Feature.Name: Minor Property
Feature.Text: The first time you touch a gem or piece of jewelry while attuned to this artifact, the value of the gem or jewelry is reduced by half.

MagicProperty.Name: Minor Detriment - Gem Rotting
MagicProperty.Description: The first time you touch a gem or piece of jewelry while attuned to this artifact, the value of the gem or jewelry is reduced by half.
